name: Futanari Quest
description:
STEAM RELEASE: Probably never, ever.

Get it on Nutaku, instead! Available right now!

Futanari Quest is an ecchi RPG with yuri themes. You take the role of Yui, a young woman who is blessed/cursed with a surprise gender-change! You're given the challenging task of ensuring your genetics are passed down to future generations.

Alongside your bubbly fairy companion, you'll meet plenty of charming characters along the way: strong warrior women, shy princesses, cold-hearted killers and so many more.

Compared to the original Patreon version, this edition of the game features an extra encounter with 2 new CGs and resolves the main storyline. In addition, the battle and crafting systems are now complete.

Features:
  • High-quality artwork, with a complete set of character portraits and full CGs
  • Full English voice acting
  • Battle monster girls, or converse with them to earn their trust
  • Lots of areas to explore
  • 10 fully voiced CG encounters, complete with artwork variations
  • 35 gallery images to unlock

Futanari Quest features 4 - 5 hours of gameplay, with plenty of replayability. Challenge yourself to unlock all the scenes in the gallery or charm all of the monster girls!

STEAM RELEASE: Probably never, ever.

Get it on Nutaku, instead! Available right now!
